job_tasks.phrase: Als data engineer weet jij precies wat onze gebruikers nodig hebben.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the role involves understanding user needs related to data, which is a precursor to data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je ontwikkelt dataproducten binnen een Data Mesh architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the core task of developing data products within a specific architectural paradigm (Data Mesh), which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Daarmee stel je software engineers in staat nieuwe IT-oplossingen te bouwen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes enabling other software engineers to build IT solutions, implying the data products created are foundational for software development, fitting into the integration aspect of software engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Alles draait vandaag de dag om data. De energiemarkt des te meer.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights an understanding of the business context (energy market) and the importance of data within it.

soft_skills.phrase: Als data engineer weet jij precies wat onze gebruikers nodig hebben.
soft_skills.justification: This indicates an understanding of user needs, which is a key aspect of business understanding and translating requirements.

soft_skills.phrase: Daarmee stel je software engineers in staat nieuwe IT-oplossingen te bouwen.
soft_skills.justification: Enabling other engineers implies a collaborative effort and communication of data product capabilities.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a Data Engineer role focused on developing data products within a Data Mesh architecture to enable software engineers. While it mentions data and enabling software engineers, it does not contain any tasks or technologies related to AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, or the specific infrastructure for AI/ML operations (MLOps). The core responsibilities fall under traditional data engineering and enabling software development, not AI/ML specialization or integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on data engineering and enabling software engineers. There are no mentions of AI/ML specific tasks or technologies, making the classification straightforward. The role is clearly defined as a traditional Data Engineer.
